TopicTitle: Tactical Gamer vs Armored Fist - Scrim, Round 4

Articles.Content:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=xjSHeVd8sK4#!

The guy in the back ground giving out orders to the Squad Leaders is me. We wont this match with a 111 tickets left. Was a lot of fun, we had 3 matches prior to this one.
What game....I dont do many FPS prefer Arma2:Operation Arrowhead

What game....I dont do many FPS prefer Arma2:Operation Arrowhead

Yeah, I prefer ArmA2: Operation Arrowhead, ArmA2: Combined Operations, and ArmA2: Private Military Company.

But congratulations on winning, and I would like to ask what game that is too.
Are you guys serious? BF3 has been out for some time now.

Are you guys serious? BF3 has been out for some time now.

At least I know that, and that COD8 is out (yes its officially called MW3 but I perfer the name COD8). Nether are FPS I play though (no open world, high emphasis on multiplayer, regenerating health). I much perfer the original Battlefields (1942, Vietnam, 2, 2142).

(yes its officially called MW3 but I perfer the name COD4)

Well, it\'s exactly like CoD 4 in every aspect...

Well, it\'s exactly like CoD 4 in every aspect...

Typo, but that is true, except it has a worse singleplayer...
